title: Edit IDA signal handler
content:
In Ida Pro while debugging linux process with gdbserver I got window that show than SIGTRAP has been arrived, I choose to pass it to application.

How can I edit that choose now? I want to ignore this signal and not pass it to application

By the way,what signals are causing the process to die in linux ,so I will choose to not pass them to application?

answers_data.content: Debugger > Debugger Options..., Edit Exceptions.
